item.title: Twilio says hackers identified cell phone numbers of two-factor app Authy users
item.description:
Twilio says "threat actors were able to identify" phone numbers of people who use the two-factor app Authy.

The news brings closure to more than two years of volleying back and forth between some of the biggest names in additive manufacturing.

item.title: Groups save big at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description:
Planning to attend TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 with your team? Maximize your team-building time and your company’s impact across the entire conference when you bring your team. Groups of 4 to 9 save 15% on passes, and if you have a group of 10 or more, you can save 30%. Here’s a sneak peek at some […]

item.title: Music video-sharing app Popster uses generative AI and lets artists remix videos
item.description:
As more music streaming apps and creation tools emerge to compete for users’ attention, social music-sharing app Popster is getting two new features to grow its user base: an AI image generator for cover art and a collaboration capability where artists can remix another user’s song.  Initially launched last year as a song-creation tool and […]

item.title: Threads nears its one-year anniversary with more than 175M monthly active users
item.description:
Meta’s Threads now has more than 175 million monthly active users, Mark Zuckerberg announced on Wednesday. The announcement comes two days away from Threads’ first anniversary. Zuckerberg revealed back in April that Threads had more than 150 million monthly active users, up from the 130 million reported in February. Threads launched on July 3, 2023, at […]

Amazon TV deals ahead of Prime Day are actually pretty good
item.description: Your best bets to grab a TV before Prime Day starts in July include a 65-inch TCL TV under $500 and a $200 50-inch Fire TV.

item.title: Prime Day 2024: 5 must-shop product categories
item.description: Amazon Prime Day is right around the corner! Literally thousands of products will go on sale during Amazon's two-day shopping event, but not all of those sales will be good deals.

item.title: Live Apple deals help you save on iPads, MacBooks, and more ahead of Prime Day
item.description: See the best early Prime Day deals on Apple products, including a $199.01 discount on the M1 iPad Air, along with price drops on MacBooks and Apple Watches.

item.title: Some of our favorite headphones and speakers are already on sale ahead of Prime Day
item.description: Prime Day is just a couple weeks away, but we're already seeing deals crop up on Sony, Bose, JBL, and Apple headphones and speakers.

item.title: Take $100 off the Dyson Airstrait and get damage-free hair straightening
item.description: As of July 3, get the Dyson Airstrait Straightener for $100 off at Amazon.
